full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,HAL HA DZA SAG THU HAN AE MAG GI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA MA TI BAG ZHI, AEL KOG SAN MER GEN PAndI T'A HU THOG THU'I SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI ZHABS BRTAN SMON TSIG SVA STI'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES HAL HA DZA SAG THU HAN AA MAG GI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA SA TI BAG ZHI, AEL KOG SAN MER GEN PAndI T'A HU THOG THU'I SPRUL PA'I BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI ZHABS BRTAN SMON TSIG SVA STI'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, GSOL DPON SANGS RGYAS, KH'A TSOGS PA DAR HU GNYIS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA LHA RDZAS DANG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, PHO BRANG NANG GI THAM KA BLA MA JING ZU'U CH'AN SHR'I THU'U BKRAN HU THOG THU BLO BZANG BSHAD SGRUB DBANG PHYUG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSHAD SGRUB DBANG PHYUG RGYA MTSO,
